entry.title: Thank you
entry.content: Thank you, Bryan Gilbert, Christian Johansen and other authors of the Clojure code behind this new blog. I'm finding that understanding and using Clojure is a refreshing antidote to the current day job, which is dismayingly full of SOAP, Maven, Spring, things called Websphere.* and someone else's copy-and-paste Java. Never mind! Not for much longer, then I'm out into the warm sunlight of a new opportunity.
